title: Perform Grade Control Modeling
description: A grade control geologist uses data from blast drillholes to create a short-term grade model to guide mining.

tasks.description: Import the assay data from the samples taken from the blast drillholes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The blast hole sample data is loaded and validated.

tasks.description: Create a high-resolution grade control model of the bench to be mined.
tasks.expected_outcome: A detailed model showing the location of high-grade and low-grade ore is created.

tasks.description: Digitize the ore-waste boundaries on the model and provide this 'ore mark-out' map to the surveyors and operators.
tasks.expected_outcome: A map is created that will be used in the pit to visually separate ore from waste during loading.
